gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop

Class OldApiHadoopTextInputSource<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<S,D>
      • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,Text,LongWritable,Text>
        • gobblin.source.extractor.hadoop.OldApiHadoopTextInputSource<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - output schema type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Source<S,Text>

    public abstract class OldApiHadoopTextInputSource<S>
extends OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,Text,LongWritable,Text>
    An extension to OldApiHadoopFileInputSource that uses a TextInputFormat.

    A concrete implementation of this class should at least implement the OldApiHadoopFileInputSource.getExtractor(WorkUnitState, RecordReader, FileSplit, boolean) method.

    • Method Detail

      • getFileInputFormat

        protected FileInputFormat<LongWritable,Text> getFileInputFormat(State state,
                                                                JobConf jobConf)
        Description copied from class: OldApiHadoopFileInputSource
        Get a FileInputFormat instance used to get FileSplits and a RecordReader for every FileSplit.

        This default implementation simply creates a new instance of a FileInputFormat class specified using the configuration property HadoopFileInputSource.FILE_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS_KEY.

        Overrides:
        getFileInputFormat in class OldApiHadoopFileInputSource<S,Text,LongWritable,Text>
        Parameters:
        state - a State object carrying configuration properties
        jobConf - a Hadoop JobConf object carrying Hadoop configurations
        Returns:
        a FileInputFormat instance
